Translations.Text: unaka pratiphal unake paalanahaar kee or se sada rahane vaale baag hain. jinake neeche naharen bahatee hongee. ve unamen sada nivaas karenge. allaah unase prasann hua aur ve allaah se prasann hue. ye usake lie hai, jo apane paalanahaar se dara
jab dharatee ko pooree tarah jhanjhod diya jaayega
tatha bhoomi apane bojh baahar nikaal degee
aur insaan kahega ki ise kya ho gaya
us din vah apanee sabhee soochanaayen varnan kar degee
kyonki tere paalanahaar ne use yahee aadesh diya hai
us din log titar-bitar hokar aayenge, taaki ve apane karmon ko dekh len
to jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee puny kiya hoga, use dekh lega
aur jisane ek kan ke baraabar bhee bura kiya hoga, use dekh lega
un ghodon kee shapath, jo daudakar haanph jaate hain
phir pattharon par taap maarakar chingaariyaan nikaalane vaalon kee shapath
phir praatah kaal mein dhaava bolane vaalon kee shapath
phir sena ke beech ghus jaate hain
vaastav mein, insaan apane paalanahaar ka bada krtaghn (naashukara) hai
nishchit roop se, vah isapar svayan saakshee (gavaah) hai
vah dhan ka bada premee hai
kya vah us samay ko nahin jaanata, jab qabron mein jo kuchh hai, nikaal liya jaayega
